name: Covivi Run
description:
This small game was done as a project to learn the Godot game engine nothing more. The sprites used on the game we sourced from Open Pixel Project website and Mobile Game Graphics. Big up to the artists from the two sites for their wonderful artwork.  Yep, the name inspired by the covid 19 pandemic, just trying add a bit of fun during these difficult times.

This is my first ever indie game and it was a solo project. The sound files used in the game came with the tutorial files from Godot website. Thank you in advance for playing.
